tooltip.custom: Defines a custom aggregation function or expression in JavaScript.
tooltip.filter: Returns an array with only those elements that match the condition.
tooltip.group: Group records based on field values and construct personalized accumulators
tooltip.label: Replaces the choice values for the choice texts (if defined) in the specified field.
tooltip.selectedFields: Only unused fields can be removed.
tooltip.sort:
Sorts all input documents and returns them to the pipeline in sorted order.
Establishing consecutive sorting stages will simultaneously sort all fields.
tooltip.unwind: Deconstructs an array field from the input documents to output a document for each element.
tooltip.user: Replaces the user ID with some information about the user. Note that the result will always be an array. Use unwind if necessary.

help.minCols: Reducing the number of columns may not have a direct impact if the dashboard contains widgets wider than the specified limit.

tooltip.fixedRowHeight:
Size of rows in pixels.
Must be greater or equal to 50.
tooltip.margin:
Gap in pixels between widgets.
Must be a positive integer.
tooltip.minCols:
Number of columns.
Must be an integer between 4 and 24.
tooltip.minimumHeight:
Minimum height of the grid in pixels.
Must be greater than or equal to 0. 
The dashboard won't automatically fit to the screen if its height is below this number.

data.fromFormWithVersion:
Form "{{formName}}" was imported with version ID {{versionID}}.
Specify the frequency entries should be fetched from KoboToolbox below or press the button to import now.

strictVersionPolicy.label: Strict version policy
strictVersionPolicy.tooltip: When importing a form from KoboToolbox, it is possible to have multiple versions and iterations over time. Enabling the strict version policy ensures that only form entries with the same version as the one at the time of import will be fetched. Disabling this option allows fetching entries from any version of the form.

tooltip.schedule: Enter the schedule time to fetch the Kobo entries

tooltip.inherit: Creates a child form using a template from the resource linked to the core form
tooltip.kobo: Creates a form from a KoboToolbox form, using the same template
tooltip.resource: Creates a core form that allows the creation of children forms linked to this core form. It will also create a new resource.
tooltip.template: If no template is selected, core structure will be loaded

displayIf.title: Display condition
displayIf.tooltip: The button will be displayed on the row only if the condition is met

inline.title: Inline
inline.tooltip: When enabled, the button will be displayed in each row of the grid instead of the widget's header

tooltip.attach: When enabled, you must provide a form and a field of this form. All selected rows will be attached to a record from this form. The user will be able to choose which record using a the given field

mail.selectDistributionList: Select the distribution list that will set recipients of the email
mail.selectTemplates: Select the email templates users will be allowed to choose from when using the action

tooltip.notify: When enabled, you must provide a channel and a message. All selected rows will be sent as a single notification on the specified channel. The provided message is used to define the notification’s action
tooltip.publish: When enabled, you must provide a channel. All selected rows will be sent as a single publication on the specified channel. Everyone listening to this channel can receive the records

injectClasses.title: Inject values as CSS classes
injectClasses.tooltip: When a field is selected, it's value will be added to to <tr> element as a class, allowing it to be targeted by custom styling

actions.actionsAsIcons: If enabled, instead of displaying the three dots menu, all the actions will be displayed as icons side by side
actions.add: If authorized, user can add new records using selected template
actions.automaticallyMapSelectedRows: Automatically map the selected grid widget rows to a dashboard state
actions.automaticallyMapViewRows: Automatically map grid widget rows in view to a dashboard state
actions.convert: If authorized, user can convert record using another template of selected resource
actions.copyLink: If enabled, the users can copy the same url of the "Navigate to" page on the row actions
actions.delete: If authorized, user can delete visible records
actions.export: User can export selected columns of visible records
actions.goTo: User can go to specified page on click
actions.inline: If authorized, user can edit records in the grid
actions.mapSelectedRows: Enable button to map the selected grid widget rows to a dashboard state
actions.mapViewRows: Enable button to map grid widget rows in view to a dashboard state
actions.navigateToPage: User can go to specified page on click
actions.show: User can see full history of visible records
actions.showDetails: User can see full details of visible records
actions.singleSelection: Si activé, une seule ligne peut être sélectionnée à la fois
actions.state: Select the dashboard state to use to map and save the rows ID's. If no state is selected, a new one will be created for the widget.
actions.update: If authorized, user can update visible records

hint.attachToRecord: If the selected records are not attached to any records, the action will be canceled
hint.buttons: Quick action buttons will appear on the widget and allow you to complete any of the actions below
hint.executionOrder: Selected actions will be executed in the displayed order
hint.prefillForm: If no record is created at this point, the action will be canceled

tooltip.useRecordId: Url will contain id of the item, in order to redirect to contextual page, if configured
